duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage the collection efforts/calls for accounts receivable portfolio.
Maintain Accounts Receivable spreadsheet of chasing activity and status updates on overdue accounts.
Interact daily with customers internal and external.
Verify the validity of account discrepancies and resolve valid deductions.
Summarize receivables, perform account/payment reconciliations, and post customer payments.
Set up new customers’ accounts, verify credit worthiness, and manage credit limits.
Prepare month end close entries and reports, including AR reconciliation and intercompany recharges.
Ensure monthly processing deadlines are met as required.
Assist with year-end close process for Group reporting, Statutory reporting, and external/internal audit preparation.
Support the implementation and continuous monitoring of strong internal controls and processes across the business.
Responsible for supervising the Accounts Receivable Clerks and managing their tasks.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED; Associate degree or equivalent from a two-year college or technical school preferred
